articles.title: DPRK Asserts Independence and Equality
articles.content:
DPRK Asserts Independence and Equality
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is a dignified non-aligned country which values independence and equality more than its life and soul. Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, declared this, addressing the 15th NAM Summit on July 15. 
					 He said that the current meeting is required to pay attention to invariably holding fast to independence and peace as a core idea of the NAM in setting its orientation in view of the present situation, maintaining a strategy for unity and increasing the capability for common actions and thereby materializing its noble idea and creditably performing its mission.
					
					 Noting that not only the peace and security of the country but also the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the DPRK have been grossly violated by the high-handed acts of the U.S., Kim asserted that if such acts of the U.S. are allowed to go on, the DPRK would be totally deprived of the legitimate right to use space. 
					
					 The DPRK can never accept dialogue or negotiations minus the principle of respect for sovereignty and equal sovereignty, he stated, and went on: 
					
					 The prevailing situation compelled the DPRK government to take decisive steps to bolster up its nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The DPRK, too, is opposed to a nuclear war, nuclear arms race and nuclear proliferation like all other non-aligned countries.
					
					 The DPRK is the only country in the world which was so antagonized by the U.S. and exposed to such nuclear threat by it that it was compelled to have access to nuclear deterrence for self-defense. 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapon is not for invading or threatening others but is war deterrence for defending the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula in the true sense of the word. 
					
					 As regards the situation on the Korean Peninsula the NAM should show keenest interest in making sure that the principle of respect for sovereignty and equal sovereignty is observed among the countries concerned.
					
					 The DPRK is convinced that its struggle for independence and equality is a just one in line with the idea and common interests of the NAM. 
					
					 The DPRK government will as ever further boost the unity and solidarity with the non-aligned countries and wage a positive struggle for the stability on the peninsula and the world peace in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Greetings to Nicaraguan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Nicaraguan President
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Daniel Ortega Saavedra, President of Nicaragua, on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the victorious Sandinist people's revolution.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Nicaragua would grow stronger, Kim in the message wholeheartedly wished the Nicaraguan president great success in his work for prosperity of the country and improvement of the people's welfare.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised as Genius of Literature and Art
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised as Genius of Literature and Art
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il is a great man possessed of versatile knowledge and a genius of literature and art, said Mira Koltsova, head of the State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troupe of Russia Named after N. S. Nadezhdina on a visit to the DPRK, when interviewed by KCNA on July 16.
					 Kim Jong Il showed deep concern for the performance of the troupe during its visits to the DPRK in the past, she said, adding that he appreciated the performance although he was busy providing field guidance.
					
					 He said that mixed group dance "In memory of defenders of motherland", song and dance "small river" and other pieces are good pieces reflecting patriotism, she recalled, stressing that his every teaching instills fresh creative zeal into them.
					
					 It was the greatest honor and happiness for the troupe to have been received by Kim Jong Il and performed before him, she said.
					
					 Noting that revolutionary opera "The Sea of Blood", orchestra and chorus "Snow Falls" and other masterpieces were created under his leadership, she said that her visit to the Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory and other places helped her keenly realize what deep attention Kim Jong Il pays to the development of art.
					
					 The members of the troupe prepared the undying revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and Korean song "General of Korea" with particular efforts this time and loudly sing the songs each time they perform, she added.
					
					 Whenever I hear news of Kim Jong Il's field guidance, I feel ardent longing to see him, she stressed.

articles.title: Looks of Pyongyang Changed Fast
articles.content:
Looks of Pyongyang Changed Fast
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Mansudae Street with many multi-storeyed flats built on the very places of old ones is nearing completion in a matter of one year following its start, startling even the Pyongyang citizens.
					Pyongyang has changed its looks radically year after year in the last decades.
					
					President Kim Il Sung opened up a new history of building a democratic capital more than 60 years ago. Under his wise leadership, the Pyongyang citizens completed in 55 days the Pothong River improvement project which the Japanese imperialists said it would be impossible to carry out the project in ten years.
					
					After the war, the constructors created the "Pyongyang Speed" of assembling one flat in 14 minutes in different parts of the city, thus realizing into reality the blueprint for the rehabilitation and construction of Pyongyang City worked out by the President on the operation table of the Supreme Command during the war.
					
					In accordance with the grand plan for capital construction of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is true to the noble intention of the President, Pyongyang has been facelifted splendidly as the capital of socialist Korea.
					
					 Streets, dwelling houses and public buildings have been built with the statue of the President standing on Mansu Hill as the centre.
					
					 The past decades have witnessed the construction of many monumental edifices in the capital city, including the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, the Mansudae Art Theatre, the Mansudae Assembly Hall, the Grand People's Study House, the People's Palace of Culture, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Changgwang Health Complex, the Ice Rink, Chollima Street, Rakwon Street, Changgwang Street, Kwangbok Street and Thongil Street.
					
					 In the new century the streets from Pyongyang Station to Ryonmot-dong and the bank of the River Taedong were spruced amazingly to suit the requirements of the Songun era.
					
					 Cultural and public catering bases of the capital such as the Taedongmun Cinema, the Okryu Restaurant and the Chongnyu Restaurant were wonderfully reconstructed last year. This year, too, dwelling houses and public buildings in the city were tiled or painted with distemper of different bright colors and sidewalks were paved with color blocks.
					
					 Housing construction and projects for renovating cultural facilities and public catering establishments are under way in various parts of the city.

articles.title: Puppet Police Denounced for Suppressing Sit-in Striker
articles.content:
Puppet Police Denounced for Suppressing Sit-in Striker
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union (Jongyojo) of south Korea issued a statement on July 13 to denounce the puppet police for suppressing the chairman of Jongyojo in his sit-in hunger strike.
					 The statement recalled that the chairman launched a sit-in hunger strike in the plaza outside the Seoul City Office that day in protest against the authorities' suppression of the participants in the actions for issuing declarations on the situation.
					
					 But one police company of Namdaemun Police Station in Seoul committed such violence against him as seizing a slogan board and even a chair on charges of "violation of traffic law", etc., the statement charged.
					
					 It was obviously the plaza in front of the city office where he had been on a sit-in hunger strike but the police insisted he violated the "traffic law," it noted, adding their assertion was nothing but sheer sophism.
					
					 The statement declared the organization would support the chairman in his sit-in hunger strike defying whatever crackdown, threat and blackmail and resolutely fight against any disturbers.

articles.title: U.S. Racket of "Sanctions" against DPRK Flailed
articles.content:
U.S. Racket of "Sanctions" against DPRK Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice and other organizations grouping people of various social standings of south Korea held the 118th anti-U.S. solidarity rally in Seoul on July 14.
					 The speakers disclosed that the U.S. is keen to set in motion the State Department, Defense Department, Treasury Department and other departments in a bid to tighten "sanctions" and pressure upon the DPRK.
					
					 This misjudgment can be made only by those who are ignorant of the DPRK, they held, stressing "sanctions" and pressure would only embolden the DPRK to take strong countermeasures and aggravate the conflict between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 Underscoring the need to remove the main reason why the nuclear issue was spawned on the Korean Peninsula, they contended that the only way is for the U.S. to defuse its nuclear threat and roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK as they have persisted for several decades.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to pull back its forces from south Korea, scrap the south Korea-U.S. "alliance" for aggression and give up its commitment to provide a "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea as early as possible.
					
					 They demanded the U.S. immediately lift "the sanctions" and pressure upon the DPRK and opt for dialogue with the north.

articles.title: Remembrance Meetings on Kim Il Sung's Feats Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Meetings on Kim Il Sung's Feats Held
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held by a club, a local autonomy committee and companies in India including the Juche Philosophy Study Committee from July 1 to 5 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.  
					 Displayed in the venues were famous works of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on their immortal feats and books and photos on the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK. 
					
					 Present at the meetings were figures of the National Congress Party of India, the Communist Party of India(Marxist), the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the All India Indo－Korean Friendship Association, the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, a local autonomy committee of India, companies of India, the International Institute of the Juche Idea and the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and masses. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 P. Shiv Shankar, chairman of the All India Indo－Korean Friendship Association, and other speakers highly praised     Kim Il Sung as a prominent thinker and theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea, indicating the way to be followed by progressive humankind, an iron-willed brilliant commander who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and a great leader who established in the DPRK a socialist system centered on the popular masses independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Thanks to the solid foundation laid by the President the Korean people could bring about a turning point in building a thriving nation and successfully launched a satellite and conducted a nuclear test shortly ago, demonstrating the national power, they noted. 
					
					 Pointing out that the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, they stressed that the Korean people are convinced that they are sure to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the remembrance meeting in a club of India.

articles.title: Ugandan Figure Demands UNSC Retract Its "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Ugandan Figure Demands UNSC Retract Its "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Chango Machyo, senior adviser to Presidency of Uganda, issued a statement on July 7 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. It denounced the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK adopted by the United Nations Security Council and demanded its immediate retraction.
					 The statement noted that it was the just measures taken by the DPRK, a sovereign state, to have recently launched a satellite and conducted a nuclear test as they were for its development of science and technology and protection from the threat of outsiders.
					
					 The statement continued: 
					
					 Nevertheless, some Western countries are claiming that the DPRK violated international law. They are pulling up Pyongyang over its launch of satellite and nuclear test, interfering in its internal affairs.
					
					 Expressing positive support to and solidarity with the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, the statement held there can be neither true peace nor stability without independence and equality.

articles.title: Interviene Kim Yong Nam en la XV cumbre de los Paises No Alineados
articles.content:
Interviene Kim Yong Nam en la XV cumbre de los Paises No Alineados
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ATCC) -- Al hacer uso de la palabra el dia 15 en la XV Cumbre de los Paises No Alineados, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, destaco que la RPDC es un digno pais no alineado que aprecia mas que su vida la independencia y la igualdad.
					Esta cumbre debe prestar atencion a que debe mantener invariablemente la independencia y la paz como ideal principal del Movimiento de los No Alineados en trazar la direccion de actividades del mismo frente a la situacion actual, comenzo Kim y prosiguio:
					
					Ademas, debe estar atenta a que el MNOAL ha de realizar su noble ideal y cumplir con toda su mision al mantener la estrategia de unidad, aumentar la capacidad de accion conjunta y emplear su poderio.
					
					Hoy en dia, debido a las arbitrariedades de Estados Unidos, fueron atentadas flagrantemente en Corea la paz y la seguridad del pais, la dignidad de la nacion y la soberania del Estado. 
					
					Si se perdona tal conducta de EE.UU., la RPDC sera privada para siempre de su legitimo derecho al uso del cosmos.
					
					Son inconcebibles para nosotros el dialogo ni las negociaciones carentes del respeto a la soberania y la igualdad de la misma.
					
					Para hacer frente a la situacion dada, el gobierno de la RPDC se vio obligado a tomar las medidas decisivas para fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					Al igual que todos los paises no alineados, rechazamos la guerra nuclear, la carrera armamentista nuclear y la proliferacion nuclear.
					
					Pero, no habra en este mundo otro pais como Corea que fue tan hostilizada y amenazada por EE.UU. con armas nucleares, y por fin, se vio obligada a adquirir el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa.
					
					Nuestras armas nucleares no seran jamas el medio para agredir o amenazar a otros, sino son las fuerzas disuasivas de guerra, al pie de la letra, para defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Actualmente, el interes mas importante del MNOAL con respecto a la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana es recuperar el principio de respeto a la soberania e igualdad de la misma entre los paises involucrados.
					
					Estamos seguros que nuestra lucha por la independencia y la igualdad es la justa que conviene al ideal e interes comun del MNOAL.
					
					En el futuro tambien, el Gobierno de la RPDC seguira fortaleciendo la unidad y solidaridad con los paises no alineados bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y luchando activamente por la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la paz del mundo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a Daniel Ortega
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a Daniel Ortega
 Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Nicaragua, Daniel Ortega Saavedra, en ocasion del 30o aniversario del triunfo de la revolucion popular sandinista.
					 El remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Nicaragua se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en lo adelante y le desea de todo corazon al destinatario grandes exitos en su trabajo para la prosperidad del pais y el fomento del bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il es genio de literatura y arte, destaca Mira Koltsova
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il es genio de literatura y arte, destaca Mira Koltsova
 Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il es gran hombre con conocimientos multifaceticos y genio de la literatura y el arte.
					 Asi senalo Mira Koltsova, jefa del Conjunto de Danza Academica Nacional "Beriozka" N. S. Nadezhdina de Rusia, de visita en Corea, en una entrevista concedida el dia 16 con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea.
					
					 Recordo que el Dirigente presto profunda atencion a las funciones que ofrecia su conjunto durante las anteriores visitas a Corea y presencio una de ellas aunque estuvo muy ocupado en la direccion sobre el terreno.
					
					 El Dirigente dio al baile mixto en grupo "En memoria de los defensores de la patria", la cancion y danza "El rio pequeno" y otras piezas el valioso calificativo de excelentes obras que reflejan el patriotismo, dijo la visitante y agrego que cada vez que reciben las instrucciones del Dirigente, los miembros de su conjunto renuevan su creatividad.
					
					 Continuo que les fue el honor y felicidad mas grandes la oportunidad de reunirse con el Dirigente y mostrarle una funcion artistica de su conjunto.
					
					 Bajo la guia del Dirigente, fueron creadas las obras maestras como la opera revolucionaria "Mar de Sangre" y la musica orquestal y coro "Cae la nieve", menciono y enfatizo que en su recorrido por el Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang y otros lugares conocio bien que el Dirigente presta mucha atencion al desarrollo del arte.
					
					 Subrayo que los miembros de su conjunto se prepararon esta vez con especial dedicacion para interpretar el inmortal himno revolucionario "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il" y la cancion coreana "General de Corea" y las cantan a toda voz en todas las escenas.
					
					 Cada vez que me informo a traves de la prensa de las noticias sobre la direccion en el terreno del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, crece mas en mi la anoranza a el, concluyo.

articles.title: Toma auge en Pyongyang la rehabilitacion de edificios
articles.content:
Toma auge en Pyongyang la rehabilitacion de edificios
 Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ATCC) -- En estos dias, va tomando su perfil la moderna avenida Mansudae, donde hace un ano, la gente se ha quedado boquiabierta por haber desaparecido tantas viviendas dadas de baja.
					 En el pasado, se ha creado en Pyongyang una tremenda velocidad de construccion que permitio renovar de dia en dia y de decada en decada la imagen de esta capital causando la admiracion de todo el mundo.
					
					 Hace mas de 60 anos, gracias a la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien dio inicio a la nueva historia de construccion de la capital democratica, fue terminado al 55o dia la obra de canalizacion del rio Pothong, que en opinion de los imperialistas japoneses, no iba a terminar aunque pasen 10 anos.
					
					 En el periodo posbelico, en todas partes de esta capital se creo la "velocidad de Pyongyang", o sea, el montaje de una casa prefabricada solo en 14 minutos, llevando a la realidad el proyecto de la reconstruccion de la capital que habia elaborado el Presidente en los dias de guerra sobre la mesa para trazar planes de operacion de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					 En virtud del grandioso proyecto de construccion de la capital del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien da firme continuidad al noble proposito del Presidente, Pyongyang se ha transformado como la mas magnifica capital del pueblo.
					
					 En torno a la estatua de bronce del Presidente erguida en la colina Mansu, fueron levantados las avenidas, las viviendas y los edificios publicos.
					
					 En el transcurso del tiempo, se edificaron numerosas construcciones monumentales, entre otras, el Monumento a la Idea Juche, el Arco Triunfal, el Teatro de Arte Mansudae, el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae, el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo, el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang, el Complejo de Piscinas y Servicios de Cultura Fisica Changgwangwon, el Patinadero Cubierto y las avenidas Chollima, Rakwon, Changgwang, Kwangbok y Thong-il.
					
					 En el nuevo siglo, fueron reconstruidas a la altura de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) la zona riberena del rio Taedong y las avenidas desde la Estacion Ferroviaria de Pyongyang hasta el barrio de Ryonmot.
					
					 En el ano pasado, fueron remodelados excelentemente el Cine Taedongmun, los Restaurantes Okryu y Chongryu y otras bases culturales y de servicio gastronomico.
					
					 Este ano, las viviendas y los edificios publicos de la capital fueron ataviados con las pinturas y azulejos de colores fragantes mientras las aceras se adornaban con bloques en colores.
					
					 Hoy tambien, a lo largo de esta capital, prosigue la rehabilitacion de los establecimientos culturales y las bases de servicios gastronomicos, aparte de la edificacion de viviendas.
